resources.string: It is highly recommend to close Mobile DATA, Receivers may be able to use mobile data.
Allow app to read/write System settings. Necessary to create a Wifi Hotspot for Offline File Transfers

string.name: p2p_connect_to_diff_sender
string.u: Click here to connect to a different Sender

resources.string: Failed to connect with %s Hotspot. Retrying again..
Could not connect to SHAREthem Hotspot. Please go to Wifi settings and chose %s to start video transfer from Sender.
Do you want to turn-off Receiver mode?
Without Location(GPS) permission Spuul app is unable to Receive videos offline from Senders. Are you sure to deny this permission?
Please enable Location(GPS) permission to proceed with receiving Spuul videos Offline.\nPress Settings button and goto Permissions section to grant LOCATION PERMISSION(GPS)

• Open Receiver App in 'Receiver mode' 
(Or)
• Open WiFi settings and connect 
%s Hotspot & enter
%s
on a browser's address bar.
Do you want to stop sharing files?
Turn ON \'Send Files\' to start File Sharing
Turn ON \'Receive Files\' to receive files from Sender
